mapper.select: SELECT lecture_no AS lectureNo, lecture_name AS lectureName , start_date AS startDate, end_date AS endDate, lecture_day AS lectureDay, lecture_price AS lecturePrice , CASE WHEN NOW() > end_date THEN '강의완료' WHEN NOW() < start_date THEN '강의대기' ELSE '강의중' END AS 'lectureStatus' FROM lecture WHERE id = #{id};
SELECT b.id, b.name, b.email, b.profile_img, a.phone_num FROM member a JOIN teacher b ON a.id = b.id WHERE b.id = #{id}
